name: Zogics, LLC
overview:
Bulk gym equipment wipes, hand sanitizers, green disinfectants, and natural air fresheners from Zogics, a leading manufacturer of fitness center cleaning supplies, alcohol-free and alcohol-based hand sanitizers, health club disinfectants, air fresheners, and other gym cleaning supplies.

Buy gym equipment wipes and gym wipes refills in bulk for fitness equipment cleaning. Buy bulk gym wipes direct, and save big with gym wipes discounts.

Buy hand sanitizers in bulk including alcohol-free hand sanitizer and alcohol-based hand sanitizer in foam and gel form with hand sanitizer dispenser options.

Buy PureGreen24 green disinfectants in 32oz spray bottles or by the gallon, purchase the green disinfectant combo pack, or save big on green disinfectants by buying in bulk.

Buy bulk air fresheners including eco-friendly, natural air fresheners, and natural air freshener dispensers for use in schools, day cares, hospitals, etc.

Purchase Philips HeartStart OnSite Defibrillators and AED accessories for schools, health clubs, hospitals, clinics, warehouses, medical, and dentist offices.
